Set or remove your AFK status.

## Usage

```sh
/afk set
/afk remove
```

## Subcommands

### set

Set your AFK status.

#### Options

|   Name   |       Description      | Required |
| :------: | :--------------------: | :------: |
| `reason` | Why you are going AFK. |    No    |

### remove

Remove your AFK status.
